Remove-AzureRmStreamAnalyticsFunction.shortDescription: Deletes a function from a Stream Analytics job.

Remove-AzureRmStreamAnalyticsInput.shortDescription: Deletes an input from a Stream Analytics job.

Remove-AzureRmStreamAnalyticsOutput.shortDescription: Deletes an output from a Stream Analytics job.

Test-AzureRmStreamAnalyticsFunction.shortDescription: Tests whether Stream Analytics can connect to a function.

Test-AzureRmStreamAnalyticsInput.shortDescription: Tests the connection status of an input.

Test-AzureRmStreamAnalyticsOutput.shortDescription: Tests the connection status of an output.

Disable-AzureRmTrafficManagerEndpoint.shortDescription: Disables an endpoint in a Traffic Manager profile.

Enable-AzureRmTrafficManagerEndpoint.shortDescription: Enables an endpoint in a Traffic Manager profile.

Get-AzureRmTrafficManagerEndpoint.shortDescription: Gets an endpoint for a Traffic Manager profile.

New-AzureRmTrafficManagerEndpoint.shortDescription: Creates an endpoint in a Traffic Manager profile.

Remove-AzureRmTrafficManagerEndpoint.shortDescription: Removes an endpoint from Traffic Manager.

Remove-AzureRmTrafficManagerEndpointConf.shortDescription: Removes an endpoint from a local Traffic Manager profile object.

Edit-AzureRmWebAppBackupConfiguration.shortDescription: Edits a Web App Backup Configuration.

Get-AzureRmWebAppBackupConfiguration.shortDescription: Gets a Web App Backup Configuration.

Get-AzureRmWebAppPublishingProfile.shortDescription: Gets a Web App Publish Profile.

Get-AzureRmWebAppSlotConfigName.shortDescription: Gets the list of Web App Slot Config names.

Get-AzureRmWebAppSlotMetrics.shortDescription: Get Web App Metrics for Slot.

Get-AzureRmWebAppSSLBinding.shortDescription: Gets a Web App SSL Binding.

New-AzureRmWebAppDatabaseBackupSetting.shortDescription: Creates a Web App Backup Setting.

New-AzureRmWebAppSSLBinding.shortDescription: Creates a Web App SSL Binding.

Remove-AzureRmWebAppSSLBinding.shortDescription: Removes a Web App SSL Binding.

Reset-AzureRmWebAppPublishingProfile.shortDescription: Resets a Web App Publish Profile.

Restart-AzureRmWebApp.shortDescription: Stops and starts a Web App.

Set-AzureRmWebAppSlotConfigName.shortDescription: Sets Web App Slot Config names.

Switch-AzureRmWebAppSlot.shortDescription: Swap two slots with a Web App.
